MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH49 postcode area of Linlithgow, affecting properties in Blackness and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:43pm. Our engineers have arrived at site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:30pm on the 3rd November 2020.
